replies.body: Huh. That graphics card option narrows it down to somewhere between really good and really bad. Don't buy if they aren't going to be specific about it.

replies.body: I doubt it, we have those for mah brothers, their fps is good and bad on some days, other days it is horrible.  I am not sure if I would recommend that o_o? or update the graphics card to a better one with good GPU.  Here you can read which graphics card to choose from and depending on how much money to shell out for it.  The comment section of that article will be a bit more informative.
